page.title: 03FOLK TALES
page.content: The Ghost at{Shireoaks}manor When my dad was a boy he used to go to the{Manor}with his mates and one day they got some apples from the orchard and went in the manor all of a sudden it went all misty and sweaty and a white sheet of a man floated through a wall. The man died in{mysterious {circumstances}and nobody found his body,also under the house there is a secret passage that goes to Welbeck.The{British}troops used it in world war 2.{Sally}Ponche_at the ponds there is supposed to be a ghost called Sally Ponche ,years ago a girl went after her dog and the water flooded in on her. South farmhouse ghosts_In the farmhouse at South Farm there is supposed to be some ghosts there.
